title: Upselling Bar Staff
system_mod: Emphasize behavioral training strategies that improve upselling without feeling scripted or aggressive. Responses should sound like advice a real bar manager would give during a team meeting.
venue_context: A mid-range cocktail bar wants staff to upsell effectively without coming across as pushy or robotic. Management is looking for realistic, team-oriented coaching language.
prompt: How can I train my bartenders to upsell cocktails in a natural way that increases revenue without turning off guests?
